title.rendered: Ishq Junoon: The Heat Is On

content.rendered:
Directed by Sanjay Sharma.

Written by Pankaj Trivedi.

Cast Divya Singh(Pakshi).Reshad Delawar Khan. Rajbeer Singh(Raj). Raj Aryan(Ranjeet). Akshay Rangshahi(Veer)

Language hindi.

Producers Vinay Gupta. Anuj Sharma.

Production Shantketan Entertainments.
